allow: Bash(python -c "from dotenv import load_dotenv; import os; load_dotenv\(\); print\(''API KEY:'', os.getenv\(''ANTHROPIC_API_KEY''\)\)")

Bash(# Try Walt Disney World channel curl -s ""https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?user=WaltDisneyWorld"")

Bash(# macOS grep doesn''t support -P. Use a different approach. curl -s -L ""https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=walt+disney+world+official+magic+kingdom"" | python3 -c "" import sys, re html = sys.stdin.read\(\) ids = set\(re.findall\(r''watch\\?v=\([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11}\)'', html\)\) for vid in list\(ids\)[:20]: print\(vid\) "")

Bash(# Let me try fetching the Disney Parks channel page HTML directly curl -s -L ""https://www.youtube.com/@DisneyParks"" -H ""User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0"" | python3 -c "" import sys, re, json html = sys.stdin.read\(\) # Extract video IDs from ytInitialData JSON ids = set\(re.findall\(r''\\""videoId\\"":\\""\([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11}\)\\""'', html\)\) for vid in list\(ids\)[:30]: print\(vid\) "")
